entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to periods of rain and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
